comment.author: 25695066@N00
comment._content: This is a Republic F-84 Thunderjet about to take off from what appears to be Runway 19 at Republic Airport (FRG / KFRG). If the frame of the photo was wider, to the right you would see Republic Aviation's primary manufacturing plant at Republic Airport. Below is a link just to the east (approx. 50 meters) of the likely point from which this photo was taken. Today, stores and a parking lot occupy the space where the plant would have been. maps.google.com/maps?rlz=1C1LENN_enUS451US451&q=40.73... See the upper center left side of this aerial photo of the northeast corner of Republic Airport and the Republic Plant in Farmingdale for comparison.
